# River Rat
## Overview
*River Rat (Ex):* You do not take an armor check penalty on [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks while wearing light armor. Additionally, you gain a +2 bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks made to hide in murky water. 

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 68
